EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Business Aviation Newsletter - October 2017 Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER October 2017 HONEYWELL DATA LOADERS - FASTER LOADING, LESS FRUSTRATION Honeywell's flight management system data loaders feature the latest in media technology, enabling faster and more reliable navigation database downloads.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/data-loaders?sc_camp=AC546E2507D24ACB9F5C7DC506874472]]> Honeywell Direct Access - Support To Go
This convenient app helps pilots and operators quickly locate the nearest Honeywell-authorized service centers and dealers, get technical support, and find other vital information... Learn more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/direct-access]]> JetWave earns industry acclaim in Aviation Business Awards Shortlist
The Engineering Innovation of the Year category showcases companies demonstrating a commitment to providing significant technological, productivity and customer benefits. JetWave accomplishes this... Learn more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/blogs/2017/september/honeywell-jetwave-earns-industry-acclaim-in-aviation-business-awards-shortlist]]> HTF7700L engine receives certification for Cessna Citation Longitude
Honeywell's HTF7700L, the latest model in the HTF7000 family of engines, has now been certified by the Federal Aviation Administration for the Cessna Citation Longitude, the upcoming super mid-size aircraft from Textron Aviation... Learn more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2017/october/honeywell-engine-receives-certification-for-textron-aviation-s-cessna-citation-longitude]]>
